channel.title: Xp rate is way to fast
channel.description: im useing zenith scape and the xp rate is way to fast how can i turn it down some? in the settings i tryed messing with the numbers but it acts like it cant go lower

item.title: Xp rate is way to fast
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:3, topic:463040”][quote author=TimeRS3 link=topic=566315.msg4118403#msg4118403 date=1349381282]
settings.java it will say
XP_RATES
COMBAT
SKILLING

change those numbers
[/quote]
skills.java as wel

a long with every single method where the skill is actually handled but most skills are legit runescape exp when changing it in skills.java[/quote]

Both true, in Skills.java it’s the original runescape xp rates (almost 90% of the time), the settings.java file where it says XP_RATES, COMBAT, and SKILLING are what to multiply the values in skills.java by. So if you do SKILLING = 50, it’s going to take each xp rate in skills.java and multiply by 50. Just make the numbers in settings.java and lower them a bit.

Read full topic
item.source: Xp rate is way to fast
